LineComment.Text: "Alarm_DB".input.alarm[9] := "Faults&warnings"."Status Nok"."Drive controller A NK"; //A2-Pump A Drive Fault
"Alarm_DB".input.alarm[10] := "Faults&warnings"."Status Nok"."Drive controller B NK"; //A3-Pump B Drive Fault
"Alarm_DB".input.alarm[13] := "Control".Level_sensor_enable AND ("Level Sensor A" >= 32767); //A6-Tank A level sensor fault
"Alarm_DB".input.alarm[14] := "Control".Level_sensor_enable AND ("Level Sensor B" >= 32767); //A7-Tank B level sensor fault

"Alarm_DB".input.alarm[15] := (("Control".Pressure_sensor_select = 0) AND ("Pressure sensor Pump Inlet A" >= 32767)) OR (("Control".Pressure_sensor_select = 1) AND ("Pressure sensor Pump Inlet A_mA" >= 32767));//A8-Pump A pressure sensor fault Inlet

"Alarm_DB".input.alarm[0] := (("Control".Pressure_sensor_select = 0) AND ("Pressure Sensor Pump Inlet B" >= 32767)) OR (("Control".Pressure_sensor_select = 1) AND ("Pressure Sensor Pump Inlet B_mA" >= 32767)); //A9-Pump B pressure sensor fault Inlet
"Alarm_DB".input.alarm[1] := "Re-filling Sequence DB"."Compare Re-fillingFilling sequence A"."Refilling Error"; //A10- Tank A refilling Error // not used
"Alarm_DB".input.alarm[2] := "Re-filling Sequence DB"."Compare Filling sequence b"."Refilling Error"; //A11- Tank B refilling Error // not used
"Alarm_DB".input.alarm[3] := NOT("heater status"."p100 connection okay".heater1) AND "Heater settings"."heater EN 1"; //A12-Heater1 sensor fault
"Alarm_DB".input.alarm[4] := NOT ("heater status"."p100 connection okay".heater2) AND "Heater settings"."heater EN 2"; //A13-Heater1 sensor fault
"Alarm_DB".input.alarm[5] := NOT ("heater status"."p100 connection okay".heater3) AND "Heater settings"."heater EN 3"; //A14-Heater3 sensor fault
"Alarm_DB".input.alarm[6] := NOT ("heater status"."p100 connection okay".heater4) AND "Heater settings"."heater EN 4"; //A15-Heater4 sensor fault
"Alarm_DB".input.alarm[19] := "Faults&warnings"."Status Nok"."Over pressure A inlet"; //A28- Pump A Inlet over pressure
"Alarm_DB".input.alarm[20] := "Faults&warnings"."Status Nok"."Over pressure B inlet"; //A29- Pump B Inlet over pressure
"Alarm_DB".input.alarm[21] := "Faults&warnings"."Status Nok"."Level empty A1" OR "Temp".bit20 ; //A30-Tank A1 Level Empty
"Alarm_DB".input.alarm[23] := "Faults&warnings"."Status Nok"."Level empty B1" OR "Temp".bit21; //A32-Tank B Level Empty
"Alarm_DB".input.alarm[40] := "Faults&warnings"."Status Nok"."Low level A1"; //A33-Tank A1 low level
"Alarm_DB".input.alarm[42] := "Faults&warnings"."Status Nok"."Low level B1"; //A35-Tank B low level
"Alarm_DB".input.alarm[43] := "pressure"."Control A"."under pressure Occured"; //A36-Pump A Inlet lower pressure
"Alarm_DB".input.alarm[44] := "pressure"."Control B"."under pressure Occured"; //A37-Pump B Inlet lower pressure

Component.Name: Potlife elapsed machine not in regeneration

LineComment.Text: "Alarm_DB".input.alarm[77] := "Mixing ratio"."mixing ratio Low Warning"; //A70-Warning mixing ratio low
"Alarm_DB".input.alarm[78] := "Mixing ratio"."mixing ratio high Warning"; //A71- warning Mixing Ratio high
"Alarm_DB".input.alarm[79] := "Mixing ratio"."Mixing ratio Low Error"; //A72- Error Mixing ratio Low
"Alarm_DB".input.alarm[64] := "Mixing ratio"."Mixing ratio high Error"; //A73- Error Mixing Ratio high
"Alarm_DB".input.alarm[89] := "level"."Drum Level Low A1"; //"A82-Level Low Drum A1"
"Alarm_DB".input.alarm[90] := "level"."Drum Level Low B1"; //"A83-Level Low Drum B1"
"Alarm_DB".input.alarm[91] := "level"."Drum Level Low A2"; //"A84-Level Low Drum A2"
"Alarm_DB".input.alarm[92] := "level"."Drum Level Low B2"; //"A85-Level Low Drum B2"
"Alarm_DB".input.alarm[93] := "level"."Drum Level Empty A1"; //"A86-Level Empty Drum A1"
"Alarm_DB".input.alarm[94] := "level"."Drum Level Empty B1";//"A87-Level Empty Drum B1"
"Alarm_DB".input.alarm[95] := "level"."Drum Level Empty A2"; //"A88-Level Empty Drum A2"
"Alarm_DB".input.alarm[80] := "level"."Drum Level Empty B2"; //"A89-Level Empty Drum B2"
"Temp".bit20 := ("HMI".supplySelection = 1) AND "level"."Drum Level Empty A1" AND "level"."Drum Level Empty A2";
"Temp".bit21 := ("HMI".supplySelection = 1) AND "level"."Drum Level Empty B1" AND "level"."Drum Level Empty B2";
"Alarm_DB".input.alarm[81] := "Faults&warnings"."Status Nok"."Pressure sensor Pump A Outlet"; //"A90 Pressure sensor Pump A Outlet Fault"
"Alarm_DB".input.alarm[82] := "Faults&warnings"."Status Nok"."Pressure Sensor Pump B Outlet"; //"A91 Pressure sensor Pump B Outlet Fault"
"Alarm_DB".input.alarm[83] := "Faults&warnings"."Status Nok"."Over pressure A outlet"; //A92- Pump A Outlet Over PRessure
"Alarm_DB".input.alarm[84] := "Faults&warnings"."Status Nok"."Over pressure B outlet"; //"A93 Over pressure B outlet"
"Alarm_DB".input.alarm[85] := "pressure"."Control A_Outlet"."under pressure Occured"; //A94- Pump A Outlet Under Pressure
"Alarm_DB".input.alarm[86] := "pressure"."Control B_Outlet"."under pressure Occured"; //"A95- Pump B Outlet Under Pressure"
